title: Urgent Opening Android Engineer-Noida Sec 63(Night Shift)US Shift
jobDescription:
Desired Qualifications and Skills:

  • Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • 5+ years of experience in Android development with a strong portfolio of published apps.
  • Proficiency in Kotlin, including advanced features and best practices.
  • In-depth experience with MVVM architecture and Jetpack components such as Room, WorkManager, and LiveData.
  • Hands-on experience with Jetpack Compose for modern UI development.
  • Solid understanding of Coroutines, StateFlow, and SharedFlow.
  • Familiarity with Dependency Injection using Dagger2.
  • Experience using LeakCanary for performance optimization and memory leak detection.
  • Strong knowledge of SOLID principles and software design patterns.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work in a fast-paced environment.
  • Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively with a team.

Preferred candidate profile

Programming Languages- Kotlin, Java

Architectural Patterns -MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel), MVP (Model-View-Presenter)

UI/UX Design-Jetpack Compose, XML Layouts, Material Design, ConstraintLayout

Jetpack Components-LiveData, ViewModel, Room, WorkManager, Navigation, DataBinding

Reactive Programming-Coroutines, StateFlow, SharedFlow, RxJava

Dependency Injection-Dagger2, Hilt

Networking-Retrofit, OkHttp

Database-Room, SQLite

Asynchronous Processing-Coroutines, RxJava, Executors

Testing-JUnit, Espresso, Espresso Roboelectric

Performance Monitoring-LeakCanary, Android Profiler, Firebase Performance Monitoring

Version Control-Git, GitHub, GitLab

Build Tools-Gradle, Android Studio, ProGuard

Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) -Jenkins


  • Comfortable for Night Shift (6:30 PM to 3:30 AM) Onsite Noida Sec 63
  • Very Good in Communication
  • Should have Training or Teaching experience

Please Note: It is not development role, main job responsibilities would include Technical Training , Technical guidance to consultants in terms of JD/RUC sessions, aiding them in cracking interviews etc.


Perks and benefits

  • Salary Best in Industry
  • Cab
  • Meal
  • Incentives


Address:- Noida Sec 63 Interested candidate can call Shivangi 9810864895 or can share resume at shivangi.p@emonics.com


Regards

HR Team

title: Oracle Fusion Financial Functional Consultant - Airoli

placeholders.label: Mumbai Suburbs, Navi Mumbai, Mumbai (All Areas)

jobDescription:
Location : Mumbai ( Airoli )


Work Mode : Work from Office


Notice Period : 30 - 45 Days preferred ( Early Joiners will be added advantage )


Role & responsibilities


  • Oracle Fusion Finance Functional, Total Oracle ERP experience of around 5 years with at least 3+ years in Oracle Fusion Finance
  • Must have experience working in Production support projects, implementation experience is an added advantage
  • Must be conversant in GL, AP, AR, FA & CM setups & functionalities
  • Must understand India GST calculations & related processes
  • Should understand Inbound & Outbound integration flow with Oracle fusion
  • Must be able to work with Fusion technical consultant to explain functional requirements related to BPM / OTBI reports
  • Must be confident to directly interact with end users and customers finance leads
  • Must be conversant in written, verbal & email communication
  • Should have knowledge on Production support processes & ticket handling processes
  • Should be able to connect with Oracle support for priority issues
  • Should be aware of month end closing processes
  • Must be aware of the critical finance reports & its functionalities (Trial balance, GL analysis, Supplier ageing, Customer ageing etc)
